document.full_text: a group of auto workers in ohio is suing general motors and the united auto workers union, claiming that gm unfairly denied them full pay and benefits and the union failed to represent and support them.
document.title: ohio gm workers sue company, union for back pay
lines_and_colors: a group of auto workers in ohio is suing general motors and the united auto workers union, claiming that gm unfairly denied them full pay and benefits and the union failed to represent and support them.
